section.title: Tracers
section.para: The example Application uses multiple JAIN SLEE 1.1 Tracer facility instances. Below is full list:

row.entry: javax.slee.SbbNotification[service= ServiceID[name=Sip Registrar,vendor=org.mobicents, version=1.0],sbb=SbbID[ name=SIP Registrar, vendor=org.mobicents,version=1.0]] .SipRegistrar
javax.slee.SbbNotification[service= ServiceID[name=Sip Registrar,vendor=org.mobicents, version=1.0],sbb=SbbID[ name=DataSourceChild, vendor=org.mobicents,version=1.0]] .DataSourceChildSbb

important.para: Spaces where introduced in LOG4J category column values, to correctly render the table. Please remove them when using copy/paste.

section.title: Alarms
section.para: The example Application does not sets JAIN SLEE Alarms.
